CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( "/" + Id + "/e?save=1&notifyContact=0&cas7=Pending - Customer - Need More Info - 8&nooverride=1&retURL=/" + Id, "8 Need More Info", "_self") + " - " + HYPERLINK( "/" + Id + "/e?save=1&notifyContact=0&cas7=Pending - Customer - Info Provided - 8&nooverride=1&retURL=/" + Id, "8 Info Provided", "_self")
CustomField.label: 2x8 Status
